{{Actor| | type = Map spot | name = Drops | class = HereticSoundSequence3 | game = Heretic | doomednum = 1202 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SoundSequence|SoundSequence]]→<u>HereticSoundSequence3</u>
Plays sound sequence number 2 from the list of Heretic's environmental sound sequences.
==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR <u>HereticSoundSequence3</u> : {{Class|SoundSequence}} { {{Property|Args}} 2 }
==== [[SNDSEQ]] definition ==== :AFX_Drops environment 2 slot [[HereticAmbience]] play world/amb3 delayrand 16 47 play world/amb7 delayrand 16 47 play world/amb3 delayrand 16 47 play world/amb7 delayrand 16 47 play world/amb3 delayrand 16 47 play world/amb7 delayrand 16 47 end
